definition: word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: Please use theinputform, don't send new entries by email.
sentences.chinese: 请使用输入格式，不要用电子邮件发送新词目。

sentences.english: The head-words in this dictionary are printed in bold type.
sentences.chinese: 这部词典的词目是用黑体字排印的。

definition: the meaning of sth/an explanation of the meaning of words or phrases/definition/an interpretation (of doctrine)/religious doctrine
Hanyu Da Cidian, the largest Chinese dictionary, with over 375,000 word entries, first published 1986-1994
Hanyu Da Zidian, one of the most comprehensive Chinese character dictionaries with 54,678 (and later 60,370) entries, first published between 1986-1990
to collect words/to harvest entries for a dictionary
Cihai, an encyclopedic dictionary first published in 1915, and frequently revised
marginal notes/annotation/to annotate/to add comments to text
